mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_SYS_LOG ( ID, USERID, USERNAME, CREATETIME, IP, menuname, opername, retain1, retain2, retain3, SOURCE ) VALUES ( #{log.id:VARCHAR}, #{log.userid:VARCHAR}, #{log.username:VARCHAR}, #{log.createtime:TIMESTAMP}, #{log.ip:VARCHAR}, #{log.menuname:VARCHAR}, #{log.opername:VARCHAR}, #{log.retain1:VARCHAR}, #{log.retain2:VARCHAR}, #{log.retain3:VARCHAR}, #{log.source:INTEGER} )
